chapters.title: Chapter 4: The Pattern Groans
chapters.info: Nevarin, p. 87—Wise One with green eyes. She is tall and thin and has long, sandy, yellow hair. She went with Perrin to seek out Masema. Perrin thinks she could give Nynaeve lessons in getting angry. She visited the Blight once as a girl; her father thought it was important for her to see it. She still travels with Perrin.
